programme.title: L'autre versant de la montagne, 2e partie
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 1978. A crippled skier finds true love with a trucker.
Réalisation : Larry Peerce
Avec : Marilyn Hassett Timothy Bottoms Nan Martin

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc: Greg Westlake learns how to take a hit with Shayne Smith and Eric Rodrigues-Furtado, two of the newest members of Canada's Wheelchair Rugby team.

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc: (S03EP01) In this episode of #IGotThis... adjusting your attitude. A fencing coach, with limited mobility, and his young student, who has cerebral palsy, realize being different doesn't mean being less.

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc: (S05EP36) We explore the latest technology for people who enjoy grilling and are members of the blind and partially sighted community, including accessible grilling gadgets and tech tools.

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) In this instalment of Disrupt, we follow work from a filmmaker and an Indigenous artist, and take a peek at an experimental film and a risqué theatre performance.
Année : 2023

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:
(S01EP05) With the rise of dating apps, virtual reality and porn, is the Internet a utopia, or a minefield, for people with disabilities looking to explore their sexuality ? Rachele hunts for the truth.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S02EP03) Wes is an aspiring actor with an energy that's larger than life. They've recently come out as non-binary and want a new wardrobe that accurately reflects their gender.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc: Année : 2022

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:

Année : 2022

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP12) Trying to give to those who mean a lot, Chris and Alex go to Jampy's to make custom laser-printed Christmas ornaments. Then, they help a friend build a spherical bookshelf for her local hero.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:

Année : 2022

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:

programme.desc:
